class.name: FastHadamardTransformerTest

javadoc.text: Test of transformer for the a 8-point FHT (means n=8)
Test of transformer for the a 4-points FHT (means n=4)
Test the inverse transform of an integer vector is not always an integer vector
Test of transformer for wrong number of points

method.name: checkDoubleTransform
method.comment: compare computed results to precomputed results

method.name: checkIntTransform

method.name: checkInverseDoubleTransform
